alert.note: Alert for Craighead; Greene (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 10 at 2:23PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Greene and northeastern Craighead Counties through 300 PM CDT... At 222 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Monette, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lake City, Monette, Black Oak, Lester, Poplar Ridge, East Black Oak, Macey and Schug. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
